## Checklist
- [ ] `SECURITY.md` exists
- [ ] `.github/dependabot.yml` exists
- [ ] Code Scanning (default setup) is enabled
- [ ] Secret Scanning + Push Protection are enabled
- [ ] Dependency graph is enabled
- [ ] SBOM present (CycloneDX/SPDX) or plan noted
- [ ] Workflow permissions reviewed (least privilege)
- [ ] Docs/README updated if behavior changed
